name: Post Earth
description:
!!!ATTENTION!!!

The game lags when played in browser, download the game to for a better experience.

Instructions:
WASD + space = move
Be careful when landing
Land at refuel stations to regain fuel
When a level is completed your highscore will be displayed in the main menu.

Code & level design: Abbe Sköld
Art: Samuel Olsson
Music: Gustav Bååth
